tasks.testStrategy: Verify SEO metadata, check structured data validity, validate analytics tracking implementation

tasks.title: Redesign Navigation Bar
tasks.description: Redesign the navigation bar to be cleaner and less cluttered with 4 main items and a prominent resume download button, meeting accessibility and performance standards
tasks.details: Implement a responsive navigation bar with sticky header, 4 main items (Work, About, Writing, Contact), and a prominent resume download button. Ensure accessibility standards (WCAG 2.2) by adding skip link, focus management, and proper ARIA labels. Implement mobile drawer with focus trap and ensure keyboard navigation. Optimize performance metrics (INP ≤ 200ms, CLS ≤ 0.02) by minimizing layout shifts and ensuring fast load times. Follow Material Design/Carbon UI patterns for consistency. Include skip link, focus management, mobile drawer with focus trap, and proper ARIA labels as specified.
tasks.testStrategy: Test navigation accessibility with screen readers, verify mobile drawer functionality across devices, check focus management and keyboard navigation. Measure performance metrics (INP and CLS) using Lighthouse. Validate UI against Material Design/Carbon guidelines. Ensure skip link is functional and ARIA labels are correctly implemented.
